title: "Artificial Intelligence provides sharper images of lunar craters that contain water ice"
excerpt: "The moon's polar regions are home to craters and other depressions that never receive sunlight. Today, a group of researchers led by the Max Planck Institute for Solar System Research (MPS) in Germany present the highest-resolution images to date covering 17 such craters."
